snippet.title: Ready, Steady, Ship! - Announcement trailer PC
snippet.description:
Wishlist on Steam!
https://steampowered.com/app/2225610/

Welcome to our exciting couch co-op game where teamwork and logic puzzles take center stage! Join forces with your buddies as you embark on an immersive journey to build the ultimate conveyor line and efficiently transfer goods out of the factory. Get ready to put your coordination and problem-solving skills to the test in this thrilling adventure!

Key Features:

* Couch co-op gameplay: Grab your friends and hop on the couch for an unforgettable cooperative gaming experience.
* Teamwork: Work together to strategize, coordinate, and optimize your conveyor line for maximum efficiency.
* Challenging puzzles: Put your logic and problem-solving skills to the test as you navigate through intricate puzzles and obstacles.
* Factory fun: Immerse yourself in the bustling atmosphere of the factory and enjoy the satisfaction of seeing your hard work pay off.
* Ready, Steady, Ship! Race against the clock to ensure smooth and timely shipment of goods, making every second count.
